description: From de- +â€Ž spume. Compare French despumer. See despumate.

verbs.description: despume (third-person singular simple present despumes, present participle despuming, simple past and past participle despumed)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, transitive) To free from spume or scum.
examples: The Honey must first be cocted in water, and despumed; then must the Vinegar be by little and little adjected
